name: Grog's Quest 2
description: Grog's Quest 2 is a game created for the Grog Games community, and a much anticipated sequel to Grog's Quest.  We have included many of the community members, memes, jokes and of course Grog's beloved mascot Tanky.  Help Grog and crew on their latest quest, after they had just successfully defeated their rival *not* Sawyer, and retrieved Tanky. Help Grog and crew on their journey as they wake up with what feels slightly like Deja Vu, and figure out the mystery.  What exactly has happened since getting back Tanky?  TIME to find out!
